comment._content: He was a Cahuilla Indian from California, hence the nickname: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chief_Meyers

comment.author: 60339227@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Mal's Best of the Best, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 33835801@N06
comment._content: Hello, My great grandmother was his nurse. I have a copy of The Glory Of Thier Times that is autographed by Chief Meyers and several high quality original photos of him with other players on the team. I am trying to find out the value of the book and photos< Thanks
